english.segment1: Come to me. All who are weary. And I will give you rest. Come to me. All who are weary. And I will give you rest
english.segment2: Lay your head down. On my shoulders. Be still my child, rest a while
english.segment3: And I'll quiet you with my love. Rejoice over you. With my song. With my song. And I'll quiet you with my love. Rejoice over you. With my song. With my song
english.segment4: Come to me. All who are weary. And take my yoke upon you. Come to me. All who are weary. My burden is easy and light
english.segment5: Lay your head down. On my shoulders. Be still my child, rest a while
english.segment6: And I'll quiet you with my love. Rejoice over you. With my song. With my song. And I'll quiet you with my love. Rejoice over you. With my song. With my song
english.segment7: And I'll quiet you with my love. Rejoice over you. With my song. With my song. And I'll quiet you with my love. Rejoice over you. With my song. With my song. And I'll quiet you with my love. Rejoice over you. With my song. With my song
english.segment8: And I'll quiet you with my love
